name: Culture Biosciences
headline: We grow cells for biotech companies.
description: Culture Biosciences grows cells for biotech companies.  Our customers genetically modify organisms to produce new therapeutics, materials, fuels and foods. We help them quickly run experiments and  develop manufacturing processes so they can get their products to market faster. We've built proprietary software and automation systems to make operating our bioreactors more efficient than existing systems. We also provide customers with new software tools that help them analyze and contextualize their data. We are currently serving a number of biotech customers and scaling out our infrastructure.

# Bioprocess development without the bottlenecks
Culture’s cloud-connected bioreactors for cell culture experiments enable greater flexibility, removing obstacles that slow down your progress. With faster and more accurate answers to your most critical bioprocess questions, you can reduce time to market and stay ahead of the competition.
![Two scientists, male and female, managing active bioreactors](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/65a534e05dd4cd9b62c45e00_culture-hero.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/659eaea8d43fc99ac89fa7fc_UI_%20Design.svg)
![Console™ graphic of cloud-connected bioreactor results](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/65a1a73be51a883df1ad2b11_UI_%20Analyze.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/65708ed3ed5f5038e3d422cc_Users-2.png)![Console™ data filtering options](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/65a1a73b86c27a3d508e2a16_UI_%20Filter.svg)
How it Works
## Run your experiments & analyze your data in the cloud
[Learn more](https://culturebiosciences.com/</how-it-works>)[Request demo](https://culturebiosciences.com/</contact>)
![Culture Biosciences branded graphic of smaller circles](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/65a1a7a6cb2e37d78caacd23_90%20%20Light.svg)
Test more parameters
![Two active cloud-connected bioreactors](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/65a534389639eec9bf44696b_bioreactor.webp)
## Leverage flexible bioreactor capacity
Our modular bioreactors for cell culture are designed for reproducibility and scalability for your experimental needs.
![Culture Biosciences line graph](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/65aa88c9b552d56d5e2c6a8b_89%20%20Light.svg)
Collect more data
![Demo of how Console™ can generate data on titer for CHO experiment 052](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/65a5342cda07da518faa3f42_cho.png)
## Analyze data in the cloud
Our software product, ConsoleTM, enables you to design, monitor, and analyze your experiments in real-time.
![Culture Biosciences dot graph](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/65aa8923fad001455cf276c0_98%20%20Light.svg)
Derive more comprehensive insights
Solutions
## Bioprocess development in our lab or yours
## Culture as a service
Our cost-effective and cloud-connected software, ConsoleTM, integrates seamlessly with your cell culture bioreactor, enabling real-time experiment design, process monitoring, and data analysis from your laptop.
[Learn more](https://culturebiosciences.com/</how-it-works>)
![Scientist manages bank of active cloud-connected bioreactors](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/65a1a43280896f2b37e2a756_culture-as-service.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/6578a966aa41f837c4743655_UI_%20Main.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/657a1933f0b6e4735de1ab48_culture-as-service-user.svg)
Coming Soon
## Culture in your lab
We are developing a series of ConsoleTM-connected bioreactors, carts, and vessels that modularly plug into your existing lab infrastructure, enabling rapid scale-out in your facility.
Get notified
## Sign up for our latest updates
We will be releasing a modular bioreactor system that you can install in your lab and control with ConsoleTM software.
Email*
![Bank of life science research instruments](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/65a6ef4119f0a0ca2a54f33d_in-lab.webp)
Benefits
## Idea to insight without constraints
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/656de53f45af0e44353bfed4_icon-screen.svg)
One interface
Our secure web application, ConsoleTM, serves as a hub to manage all of your cell culture experiments, data, and insights.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/656de53face65cfbe8d5fba7_icon-collab.svg)
Remote collaboration
Our cloud-based architecture enables you to access data and collaborate from anywhere.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/656de53f91cc3a69bd851ebe_icon-data.svg)
Analytics tools
We offer analysis tools, real-time monitoring, and modality-specific assays to help you gather the insights you need.
![Culture Biosciences branded concentric circles](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/65aa893b303eda0da9595fc5_10%20%20Light.svg)
Flexible capacity
Culture utilizes hundreds of bioreactors for cell culture experiments that can easily be scaled-out as your project needs change.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/656de53f2559aadb4cc2b2c8_icon-lightning.svg)
Real-time data access
Monitor and manage experiments in real-time as if the cell culture bioreactors were running in your own lab.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/659c31cb27ebce9fa1d20ffa_icon-model%20\(1\).png)
Data science support for DOE
Leverage our data science and _in silico_ modeling to support the design of your cell culture experiments.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/656de7da592bae0f5177371f_Cell%20Lines%20BG.svg)
Applications
## Products & services tailored to diverse bioprocesses
[Read more](https://culturebiosciences.com/<#>)[Read more](https://culturebiosciences.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/659f0aadc851e15fa3682d61_Card%20Hover%20Background%203.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656e05c38e093c7412f41973/65a015571bac3c1ce1780281_card-protein.png)## [Protein therapeuticsCulture accelerates and de-risks process development, process characterization, material generation, and modeling for protein therapeutics in our cloud-connected bioreactor facility. Learn More](https://culturebiosciences.com/</applications/protein-therapeutics>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/659f0aadc851e15fa3682d61_Card%20Hover%20Background%203.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656e05c38e093c7412f41973/65a0154fa4dd388c09907406_card-viral.png)## [Viral vectorsCulture accelerates and de-risks upstream process development for viral vectors by parallelizing experiments to reduce program bottlenecks. Learn More](https://culturebiosciences.com/</applications/viral-vectors>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/659f0aadc851e15fa3682d61_Card%20Hover%20Background%203.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656e05c38e093c7412f41973/65a0157e89c526ce8c9aa52e_card-biology.png)## [Synthetic biologyCulture enables synthetic biology companies to screen strains and optimize fermentation processes without having to invest time and money in building out internal capacity. Learn More](https://culturebiosciences.com/</applications/synthetic-biology>)
Culture feels like an extension of our own fermentation lab, not like a CRO.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656e05c38e093c7412f41973/656f77ee3fc553d852bdb0f7_wbzOc9sgrj5b8lmgr-68xcXhx4_eGJW8_rwKEQ5VQqQ.jpeg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656799199c729f598c172349/656e2d1ca7931aab18fff79d_testimonial-img-bg.svg)

Fermentation Team Leader

Monitor and manage experiments in real-time as if the cell culture bioreactors were running in your own lab.

Data science support for DOE
Leverage our data science and _in silico_ modeling to support the design of your cell culture experiments.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Culture Biosciences**

**Mission:** Culture Biosciences has a straightforward yet ambitious mission: "We grow cells for biotech companies." Their goal is to expedite the journey from lab to market by providing essential cell culture services for businesses that genetically modify organisms to develop new therapeutics, materials, fuels, and foods.

**What They Do:** Founded in Y Combinator's Batch W18, this South San Francisco-based company specializes in "Culture as a Service." Using cutting-edge proprietary software and automated systems, they run advanced bioreactors more efficiently than traditional methods. Their offerings include a range of services such as clone, strain, and construct screening, process development, process characterization, and model development, among others. Basically, if you're a biotech company needing to run experiments quickly and effectively, Culture Biosciences is your go-to partner.

**Infrastructure & Innovations:** Currently operating with a team of approximately 40 employees, Culture Biosciences is scaling its infrastructure to serve a growing number of biotech clients. Their cloud-connected bioreactors and advanced analytics tools provide real-time data and experiment management capabilities through a platform called Console™. This setup not only streamlines the experimental processes but also enhances collaboration and data analysis.

**Applications:** The company caters to a wide array of applications, including protein therapeutics, viral vectors, and synthetic biology. They help customers navigate complex bioprocesses and reduce time-to-market for innovations.

**Conclusion:** With a focus on flexibility and efficiency, Culture Biosciences stands out in the biotechnology ecosystem. Their integration of cloud technology into bioprocessing positions them as not just a service provider but an essential part of a modern laboratory infrastructure. 

For more details, visit their site at [Culture Biosciences](https://culturebiosciences.com).

If there's one thing to take away here, it’s that the future of biotech development relies heavily on innovative service platforms like Culture Biosciences that facilitate rapid experimentation.
